description: This exciting game lets you into the world of Tron. Get behind the wheel of a “light cycle”, a cool and futuristic motorcycle, and battle others on the road. Force your opponents to hit the arena walls to eliminate them from the game and come out victorious. This app is easy to learn and a lot of fun to play!
subtitle: Multiplayer 3D game inspired by the lightcycle sequence from the movie Tron
title: Armagetron

description: Atomic tanks is a multi-player game in which you attempt to destroy other tanks while trying to protect your own. You earn money for destroying other tanks; with this money you can buy upgrades and better weapons for your tank. This game is similar Scorched Earth or the Worms series of games.
subtitle: Tank-battling game
title: Atomic Tanks

description: Have you ever wanted to make your own audio clips or songs? With this app, you'll be able to access all the tools you need to create audio clips that you can play for your friends and family. Create high quality clips and songs that you can even share with the world!
subtitle: Audio editor for recording, slicing, and mixing audio
title: Audio Editor

description: Do you love playing billiards, or have you ever wanted to learn how to play? This game lets you have the experience of playing pool and other similar games right from your home. It’s simple to learn and use, yet highly realistic. Play carom, eightball or nineball games, or just practice for real-life billiards games against your friends. This app is a great tool for both playing for fun and improving your game.
subtitle: Fun 3D billiards game
title: Billiards

description: Do you love puzzle games? Then you’ll love BlockOut 2. This 3-D Tetris game is fast-paced and a lot of fun! Figure out how to stack different-shaped blocks together and create whole layers of blocks to get points, all before the blocks stack up too high and you lose! It’s great for the brain, and tons of fun.
subtitle: 3D Tetris-style game
title: BlockOut 2

description: Bovo is a game where two players take turns placing markers on the board, the winner being the first to complete a line of five markers.
subtitle: Gomoku (five in line) board game
title: Bovo

description: Brasero is a simple application to burn, copy, and erase CD and DVD media: audio, video, or data.
subtitle: CD/DVD burning application
title: Brasero

description: Battle Tanks is a funny battle on your desk, where you can choose one of three vehicles and eliminate your enemy using the whole arsenal of weapons.  It has original cartoon-like graphics and cool music, it is fun and dynamic, and it has several network modes for death match and cooperative.
subtitle: Fast 2D tank arcade game with multiplayer and split-screen modes
title: Battle Tanks

description: Say cheese! Use a webcam and this awesome photobooth app to take pictures, apply filters, and share your creations with your friends and family. Try turning yourself green, or making yourself have two faces - you'll have hours of fun playing around and creating funny, cool and beautiful pictures!
subtitle: Take pictures of yourself and your friends with this fun photobooth app
title: Cheese

description: Need an app store description now!
subtitle: Browse the Web
title: Internet

description: Imagine this: You’re the captain of Chromium B.S.U., a vital cargo ship that must get supplies to the frontline of a great war in space. With the help of your robotic fighting fleet, you just might make it. This thrilling, arcade-style game is sure to get your blood pumping. With a variety of objectives to achieve and the tools to do it, you’re on your way to a galaxy of fun!
subtitle: A fast paced, arcade-style, top-scrolling space shooter
title: Chromium BSU

description: Animals are simply amazing. From the majestic lion to the bizarre and fascinating platypus, there is so much to learn about the creatures that inhabit our world. Unlock the entire animal kingdom with this app. The whole family, from small children to curious adults, will love to learn about animals’ features, habits, and environments. It’s especially important to study the animal kingdom today, when so many species are threatened or endangered.
subtitle: Helping you understand and appreciate the creatures that share our Earth
title: Animals

description: Is there anything more mystifying and incredible than outer space? This app will introduce you to the vast cosmos, teaching you about our own solar system and beyond. Learn about planets, stars, galaxies, and even the mysteries of black holes. Understand our sun and moon, and contemplate the possibility of life elsewhere in the universe. You’ll want to take off in a rocket ship after exploring the app.
subtitle: Understand more of the universe and all it contains
title: Astronomy

description: Studying biology is an exciting pursuit, because it gives us an understanding of what it means to be a living creature. This app covers everything from cells and tiny organisms to plants and animals. You can use this textbook app to study many sub-disciplines of biology, or simply to gain a better understanding of the subject as a whole. Whether you want to know what mitochondria are or what types of reproduction exist in nature, let this app be your guide.
subtitle: Taking you on a journey through the many facets of the living world
title: Biology

description: Want to learn more about the nation you call home? Brazil is a beautiful country with a rich heritage, delicious food, exciting sports, engaging cultural events, beautiful sites, and much more. Explore articles showcasing these areas of Brazilian life, art, geography, and culture. You’ll deepen your knowledge of the nation and be able to share what you learn with friends, family, and visitors.
subtitle: Learn about the country you call home and impress family and friends with the facts you know
title: Brazil

description: Whether you’re wondering about the life of your favorite movie or pop star, or want to know more about the background and formative years of an important politician, this application can help be your guide. Have fun, learn interesting and juicy facts, and share your knowledge of famous people with all of your friends!
subtitle: Packed with information and gossip about the most famous celebrities
title: Celebrities

description: Looking to cook something great for your friends and family? This helpful app features basic cooking instructions and some great recipes. Get helpful tips about the kitchen, as well as information on how to eat healthily to keep your body in its best shape. Your loved ones will be glad to share your cooking creations, and will be impressed with your skills.
subtitle: Tips and tricks for the kitchen to share with family and friends
title: Cooking

description: Dinosaurs first appeared on Earth more than 230 million years ago. They ruled the planet for millions of years, until a catastrophic extinction event wiped out almost all of them. Fossils and other findings have taught us a great deal about these former inhabitants of Earth. This app will introduce you to these incredible prehistoric creatures. Learn about the different types of dinosaurs, from fierce carnivores to massive herbivores.
subtitle: Bringing prehistory back to life for you to discover anew
title: Dinosaurs

description: Whether you’re working online or offline, you want access to the world’s treasure trove of information – Wikipedia. With the Encyclopedia app, you’ll have just that. Use the easy search tool to look up any topic you want, and you’ll be able to read the encyclopedia entry on that topic. You’ll learn more than you ever thought possible with access to the Internet's greatest informational resource.
subtitle: The free encyclopedia that anyone can edit
title: Encyclopedia

description: Ready to take your English to a new level? Have fun and learn a new skill by playing games, listening to your favorites songs with lyrics, and watching interesting videos. Sometimes all it takes is a push in the right direction, and with our app, you’ll learn about resources that can help you improve your English and take you to new opportunities.
subtitle: Learn or improve your English while having fun
title: Learn English

description: Farming is both an ancient tradition and a modern, bustling industry. Our world’s food supply comes from hardworking farmers around the globe. Learning about this sector of the economy can be fascinating and useful, especially if you’re interested in providing food for yourself and your community. This app includes information on farming techniques and equipment, different types of agriculture, and the careers that exist in this industry. You’ll soon be an expert in crops, livestock, and more.
subtitle: The world is an amazing place, and with this app, you’ll learn all about it. Featuring information o
title: Farming

description: It can be challenging to keep track of your family’s finances, but it’s also extremely important. This app provides the resources you need to keep a budget and understand how you spend your money. Easy templates make budgeting a breeze, and tips about money management and wise spending will help you make good choices with your funds. Your family will benefit from an organized, clear, and carefully managed financial plan.
subtitle: The essential budgeting and financial literacy app for every household
title: My Budget

description: We all want to look and feel our best. With this app, you’ll learn how to exercise safely and effectively. With a range of exercises and routines, as well as information about keeping yourself safe and preventing injury, you’ll have your workout on track in no time. The app also features guidance on how to live a healthy life of the body and the mind.
subtitle: Take care of your body with tips and techniques for excercise and healthy living
title: Fitness

description: Soccer is a major sport with fans all around the world. Are you one of them? Then this is the app for you. It features everything you need to know about the world’s major teams, players, and competitions. Learn facts about the game and its history, discover the intricacies of the rules, and keep up to date with articles about your favorite sport!
subtitle: Keep up with your favorite soccer teams, read about famous players, and learn the rules of the game
title: Soccer

description: The world is an amazing place, and with this app, you’ll learn all about it. Featuring information on every country in the world, this comprehensive resource covers major cities, regions, natural features, and more. Closer to home, you’ll find detailed information about Guatemala, from its towns and cities to its rivers and mountains. Explore the wonders around you with the Geography app.
subtitle: Opening up the whole wide world for your exploration and understanding
title: Geography

description: Guatemala has an ancient and fascinating history, but it’s also a modern, bustling nation with many attractions, cultural events, and important population centers. Explore articles showcasing these areas of Guatemalan life, art, geography, and culture. You’ll deepen your knowledge of Guatemala and be able to share what you learn with friends, family, and visitors.
subtitle: Learn about the country you call home and impress family and friends with the facts you know
title: Guatemala

description: Your health is one of the most important aspects of daily life, and you need resources to make sure you understand how to lead a healthy lifestyle and stay well. With this health app, you’ll have access to information about a range of health topics. Learn about how to keep yourself and your family from getting sick, and how to take care of minor ailments when they occur. This app is your indispensable resource to learn how to live a healthy life.
subtitle: Live a healthy life with this app, packed with tips and resources
title: Health

description: How much do you know about the fall of the Roman Empire? What about the Silk Road? Who lived in the Americas long ago, and what happened to them? Why did World War I begin? The World History app can answer every question you have about the events and personalities that have shaped our modern world, and the cultures that came before us and left us their legacies.
subtitle: Telling you the tales that brought our contemporary world into being
title: History

description: Have you ever wanted to learn how to knit? What about garden? Are you interested in refinishing furniture, cleaning challenging stains, or creating an exercise plan you’ll actually follow? Whatever you’ve dreamt of learning how to do, this is the app you need. From crafts to home improvement, event planning to self-help, you’ll find nearly every topic imaginable. Each how-to article is easy to access and understand. Soon, you won’t know how you managed before!
subtitle: How to do just about anything by yourself
title: How To

subtitle: temp subtitle

description: Want to learn more about the nation you call home? Mexico is a beautiful country with a rich heritage, delicious food, exciting sports, engaging cultural events, beautiful sites, and much more. Explore articles showcasing these areas of Mexican life, art, geography, and culture. You’ll deepen your knowledge of the nation and be able to share what you learn with friends, family, and visitors.
subtitle: Learn about the country you call home and impress family and friends with the facts you know
title: Mexico

description: The stories of ancient cultures have had a massive impact on our current understanding of the world. While some myths are just that – stories we find fascinating and that help us understand our ancestors – others remain the basis for our modern religions and traditions. The app explores stories and beliefs from all over the world. From magic rituals to otherworldly creatures, myths provide us with entertainment, knowledge, and a glimpse into cultures of the past and present.
subtitle: Telling the foundational stories of the world’s many cultures, ancient and modern
title: Myths & Legends

description: Have you ever wanted to edit your own photos like the pros and create beautiful images you can share with those you love? Well, now you can do that in just a few steps! We have a variety of attractive, artful filters so you can customize your photos and create one-of-a-kind works of art from your everyday life. And with this handy app, you can post your creations directly to Facebook, so everyone can see your photography skills!
subtitle: Edit your pictures and create beautiful images that you can share with all your friends
title: Photo Editor

description: The physics textbook app takes one of the most fascinating and challenging scientific disciplines and makes it simple and fun to learn. Whatever your level of understanding, you’ll find useful information presented in a format you can follow. The app includes exciting topics like mechanics, thermodynamics, electricity and magnetism, and even astrophysics. From the atoms to the stars, you’ll learn all about the world around you, and succeed in your physics education.
subtitle: Access to the great mysteries of the physical world, and the knowledge to solve them
title: Physics

description: Do you like playing video games? Then why not create your own? Learn valuable programming and coding skills with this fun application that lets you change the rules of video games to make them your own! See what happens when you change lines of code and progress through levels to keep learning more and more about how to code. You'll soon find out that learning how to program allows you not only to change the world inside your games, but also your very own!
subtitle: Learn to program computers by creating your own video games
title: Coding Fun

description: The best way to make a great impression on a potential employer is to have an outstanding resume, and this app is here to help you do just that. With handy, attractive templates, you have plenty of models to use as you build your own stellar resume. Learn exactly what a resume is and what it should contain, get tips on each section, and even receive guidance on how to prepare for job interviews. This app can help you move closer to the job of your choice.
subtitle: Pick a resume template and customize the content to create an impressive resume in minutes
title: Résumé

description: Human beings and the relationships and societies they form are complicated. This app will introduce you to many of the disciplines that examine human history, cultures, and interactions. You’ll have access to the basics of psychology, sociology, anthropology, political science, and more. Understanding the fundamentals of such disciplines will help you navigate the ways we interact and relate to each other. You’ll come away with a rich understanding of human behavior.
subtitle: A fascinating look at society that will help you understand yourself and your culture
title: Social Sciences

description: Translating from one language to another is a great way to bridge across cultures. It’s also important in many day-to-day activities in our increasingly globalized world. With the Translate app, you can understand and be understood in virtually any language. The app features an easy-to-understand setup so that you can use it without any trouble or hassle. It’s delightfully simple. Make new connections – and even new friends – with the world’s languages at your fingertips.
subtitle: Translate text between many languages instantly
title: Translate

description: The world is an amazing and beautiful place! Start exploring it with this cool application that lets you see pictures and learn facts about areas from all over the world. It features information on major sites in places like the Americas, Europe, Asia and beyond. Learn about natural wonders, explore new cultures, and discover some of the most important and holy religious sites in the world!
subtitle: Explore the sites of the world from your own living room
title: Places

description: Typing is a valuable skill in almost any educational or professional environment. But did you know it could be a whole lot of fun, too? With engaging games, this typing application will teach you to use a keyboard effectively, as well as help you develop typing muscle memory. And the best part is, you’ll learn this useful skill by typing the lyrics to your favorite songs! What could be more entertaining than following along with the songs you love, all the while gaining a great new ability?
subtitle: Learn to type with games and songs
title: Typing

description: A whole world of learning is at your fingertips with the Khan Academy app. One of the greatest educational resources out there, Khan Academy, offers online video courses in a vast variety of content areas, including math, biology, chemistry, and physics. These exciting videos give you access to fascinating content, and help you learn more than just your classroom's education. The videos are free, easy to access, and provide learning opportunities that are sure to expand your mind.
subtitle: Learn about math, computers, economics, science, medicine, finance, history, and more, for free
title: Virtual School

description: “How’s the weather out there?” Answer this question easily, every day, with the click of a button. This simple weather app allows you to see what’s happening right outside your door. Will it be chilly? Should you plan for rain? Is it a perfect day to spend outdoors? Learn all you need to know about the weather to to take advantage of your day!
subtitle: Get daily local forecasts from trusted sources
title: Weather

description: YouTube is one of the most entertaining and informative sites on the Web. You can find videos of your favorite musical artists, tutorials that teach you to do virtually anything, funny or cute videos, and so much more! The YouTube app makes finding videos easier in a beautiful new way. This app is the best way to discover exactly the video you’re looking for.
subtitle: Share your videos with friends, family, and the world
title: YouVideos

description: This chat app is a truly amazing communication tool. It supports the chat functions from sites like Facebook, Jabber, MSN, AIM, Gadu Gadu, and more, and brings them all together so you can do your messaging, voice, and video chats all in one app, no matter how many contacts you have in all your other programs. All you need to do is set up this one chat with all of your other accounts and you are ready to talk to everyone you know without having to switch from application to application to talk to them all. This app also allows file sharing, in case you have pictures, documents, or media to send to loved ones while you chat. You can keep in touch with all your friends and family with this awesome app!
subtitle: Messaging program that supports text, voice, video chat, and file transfers
title: Chat

description: Need a description for the app store now!
subtitle: File manager
title: Documents

description: Staying in touch is an important part of modern life, and email has become one of the best ways of doing so. You may receive emails from faraway or close-by friends and family, access messages containing daily jokes, vocabulary, or news, and even handle important matters – all via email. When you need to check your email quickly and simply, this app is there for you.
subtitle: Full-featured tool for tool managing e-mail, address book and calendar
title: E-mail

description: Extreme Tux Racer, or etracer as it is called for short, is a simple OpenGL racing game featuring Tux, the Linux mascot. The goal of the game is to slide down a snow- and ice-covered mountain as quickly as possible, avoiding the trees and rocks that will slow you down. Collect herrings and other goodies while sliding down the hill, but avoid fish bones. This game is based on the GPL version of the famous game TuxRacer.
subtitle: 3D racing game featuring Tux, the Linux penguin
title: Tux Racer

description: This classic game is great for both children and adults alike! The goal is simple: you need to create a straight line of 4 of your circles before your opponent does. You can make a line that is horizontal, vertical or diagonal, like in Tic-tac-toe, but you'll need to be careful and pay attention to what your opponent is doing if you want to win! You can play against the computer, or against a friend, and spend hours playing this addictive and fun game!
subtitle: A fun and simple puzzle game for kids and adults
title: Four in a Row

description: Create your own world with this action-packed game that lets you travel through time and start a civilization of your very own. You'll start at the begging, in a pre-historic world, where you'll need to create your own tribe. Then, you'll move onto the middle ages, survive the plague and invent the wheel. You'll continue through the ages until you reach modern times and need to balance world politics with your agenda to lead your people to conquering the moon and beyond!
subtitle: Travel through time to create your own civilization and guide it to greatness
title: FreeCiv

description: Have you ever wanted to start your own country? Well, now you can. Go back into an alternative universe where America has still not been colonized and create towns, cities, and states that will support your ultimate plan. Will you try to dominate the world, or will you promote international peace and prosperity? You decide.
subtitle: Create your own country and leave mark in the world
title: FreeCol

description: With this useful app, you can access, download and share almost any file you'd like to on the Web. From music, videos, and games to more complex downloads like software, you can share files with millions of users. Special features include a video player built into the app. Share files large and small with a massive online community, and get the media you love right at your fingertips.
subtitle: BitTorrent dowloader app that supports file sharing
title: BitTorrent

description: Play by yourself or challenge your friends to an exciting game of frozen bubbles! Match the colored bubbles in order to knock them down and get them out of the way before they stack up too high and crash into you. You need to have a good strategy and develop a quick trigger finger in order to win!
subtitle: The most addictive computer game you'll ever play
title: Frozen Bubble

description: This app makes learning fun for young children with more than 100 games and activities! Educational topics include reading, geography, and math, and the app also features games like chess and Connect Four, which are great for young brains. Your child will have a wonderful time developing valuable skills that will help him or her throughout life.
subtitle: Activities for kids like telling time, puzzles, memory games, and more
title: EduGames

description: Run GCompris (EduGames) in administration and user-management mode.
subtitle: Teacher admin console for GCompris
title: GCompris Admin

description: Use this simple app to create and edit files that require plain text inputs. If you are a programmer or an aspiring programmer, you will need this app. With robust functionality and an easy-to-use interface, this text editor should be perfect for all of your text editing needs.
subtitle: A simple text editor for all of your text editing needs
title: Gedit

description: This application is similar to Adobe Photoshop, and it is free. This tool allows you to edit photos in a variety of ways, creating even more beautiful works of art from your original images. This app can also do things like convert formats of files or serve as a basic paint program. There are so many possibilities for how to create cool images once you get the hang of this helpful editing app!
subtitle: Image retouching and editing tool
title: GIMP

description: Do you ever consider how often you need to do basic or even complex math in daily life? From calculating a budget to converting measurements in a recipe to figuring out taxes, you probably use equations more regularly than you think. That’s why this calculator app comes in handy. Perform simple arithmetic quickly, or allow the calculator to do more advanced work, depending on your needs. You’ll never struggle to perform mathematical tasks again as long as you have this calculator app!
subtitle: Full-featured scientific calculator with many bonus tools
title: Calculator

description: This math application offers advanced mathematical computing functions that can be used for far more than just basic calculations. If you’re a math whiz who loves to experiment with this exciting discipline, this is the app for you. And even if you’re not, the app works wonderfully as a high-level calculator. Everything you need to figure out numerical mysteries is right here.
subtitle: Numerical computing environment and programming language
title: Math Plotting

description: Figure out where the dangerous mines are in order to stay alive and win the game! Each square is either an ocean or a mine, and you'll need to only click on the oceans or you'll have to start over. Each time you click on a square, you will discover what it is and see how many mines are around it in each direction. If you figure out where all the mines are, you'll win!
subtitle: Figure out where the mines are in order to win this fun puzzle game
title: Mines

description: Do you ever wish you could take a picture of your screen to save? Well now you can, with this easy-to-use screenshot app. You can choose to take a shot of your entire screen, or of just one of your windows. That way, you can make sure to save just what you need and nothing more.
subtitle: Take a picture of your screen to save
title: Screenshot

description: If you’re a fan of puzzles and math games, the Sudoku app is perfect for you. These fun brain teasers require you to input numbers in a grid so that you have unique rows, columns, and grid regions containing all the numbers 1 through 9. It may seem complicated at first, but with this app, you’ll learn how to play and can get the hang of the game in no time. You'll soon have hours of fun solving Sudoku puzzles and exercising your mind!
subtitle: Play one of the most popular puzzle games of all time
title: Sudoku

description: If you're an advanced user and want to display system information and launch applications without using the mouse, now you can do just that with this basic terminal app. With this modern terminal, you can see all of your commands written in different colors to help make sure you are typing them in correctly and to help you easily identify any mistakes you have made.
subtitle: Use the command line
title: Terminal

description: Try to match up all of the same numbers on the blocks to win this tricky game. You'll need to think carefully, but quickly, in order to finish the puzzle. You will be timed, so make sure to keep getting faster in order to beat your or your friends' best time!
subtitle: Match all of the same numbers in this timed puzzle game
title: Tetravex

description: Do you find yourself writing down lots of notes on pieces of paper that later get lost or torn? Or, are there so many notes on your desk that you're running out of space? No matter what kind of notes you need to take, this note app can help you keep them all in one place. This app also has the ability to link notes together so that you can easily access all related notes and stay even more organized!
subtitle: Jot down your notes and easily access them from your desktop
title: Notes

description: In reading and conversation, words often come up with which you’re not familiar. Rather than pretend you know what they mean, it’s best to have a dictionary app so you can learn new vocabulary and understand what you read and hear. This dictionary app is easy to use and navigate, so you’ll never have trouble finding just the word you’re looking for.
subtitle: Feature-rich dictionary lookup software, with lots of bonus tools
title: Dictionary

description: Turn over the pieces in front of you so that they are all the same color. Simple? Not at all! You can change pieces to your color if you can put one of your pieces in a place where you can make a row, column or diagonal line across consecutive pieces of the other color. So, you need to flip over the pieces carefully to try to make ALL of the pieces your color. Think very strategically and see if you can figure this puzzle out!
subtitle: Try to flip all the pieces to your color in this fun puzzle game
title: Iagno

description: This application is for intermediate and advanced graphic designers who need to create and edit their graphics and images. This app gives you advanced features and is comparable to Adobe InDesign. For example, it allows you to create SVGs (Scalable Vector Graphics), which allow your graphics to remain high quality no matter what size they are. Create beautiful ads, brochures, presentations and artwork with this great free graphics app!
subtitle: Vector graphics editor with transparency, gradients, node editing, pattern fills, PNG, and more
title: Inkscape

description: Kalzium is a full-featured chemistry application, including a Periodic Table of Elements, chemical reference, chemical equation solver, and 3D molecule viewer.
subtitle: Periodic table and chemistry tools
title: Kalzium

description: Kapman is a clone of the well known game Pac-Man. You must go through the levels escaping ghosts in a maze. You lose a life when a ghost eats you, but you can eat the ghosts for a few seconds when eating an energizer. You win points when eating pills, energizers, and bonus, and you win one life for each 10,000 points. When you have eaten all the pills and energizers of a level, you go to the next level, and the player and ghost speeds increase.
subtitle: Pac-Man clone
title: Kapman

description: KAtomic is a puzzle game in which the player slides atoms around the board to assemble a molecule.
subtitle: Atomix puzzle game
title: KAtomic

description: KBlackBox is a game of hide and seek played on an grid of boxes, where the player shoots rays into the grid to deduce the positions of hidden objects.
subtitle: Black Box puzzle game
title: KBlackBox

description: KBlocks is a single player Tetris-like falling blocks puzzle game.
subtitle: Falling blocks game
title: KBlocks

description: KBounce is a game where the player builds walls to confine a number of bouncing balls.
subtitle: Jezzball arcade game
title: KBounce

description: KBruch is an aid for learning how to calculate with fractions.
subtitle: Fraction learning aid for KDE
title: KBruch

description: In KSnake you steer a snake which has to eat food. While eating, the snake grows. But once a player collides with the other snake or the wall, the game is lost. This becomes, of course, more and more difficult the longer the snakes grow.
subtitle: Classical snake action game
title: KSnake

description: KDiamond is a three-in-a-row game like Bejeweled. It features unlimited fun with randomly generated games and five difficulty levels with varying number of diamond colors and board sizes.
subtitle: Three-in-a-row game
title: KDiamond

description: KGeography is an aid for learning about world geography. You can use it to explore a map, show information about regions and features, and play quiz games to test your geography knowledge.
subtitle: Geography learning aid for KDE
title: KGeography

description: KGoldrunner is a fast-paced platform game where the player must navigate a maze while collecting gold nuggets and avoiding enemies. A variety of level packs are included, as well as an editor to create new levels.
subtitle: Lode Runner arcade game
title: KGoldrunner

description: KHangMan is the well-known Hangman game, aimed towards children aged 6 and above. It picks a random word which the player must reveal by guessing if it contains certain letters. As the player guesses letters, the word is gradually revealed, but 10 wrong guesses will end the game.
subtitle: Hangman word puzzle
title: KHangMan

description: Kigo is an open-source implementation of the popular Go game. Go is a strategic board game for two players. It is also known as igo (Japanese), weiqi or wei ch'i (Chinese) or baduk (Korean). Go is noted for being rich in strategic complexity despite its simple rules. The game is played by two players who alternately place black and white stones (playing pieces, now usually made of glass or plastic) on the vacant intersections of a grid of 19x19 lines (9x9 or 13x13 for easier games).
subtitle: Go game
title: Kigo

description: Killbots is a simple game of evading killer robots. The robots are numerous and their sole objective is to destroy you. Fortunately for you, their creator has focused on quantity rather than quality and as a result the robots are severely lacking in intelligence. Your superior wit and a fancy teleportation device are your only weapons against the never-ending stream of mindless automatons.
subtitle: Port of the classic BSD console game robots
title: Killbots

description: KJumpingCube is a simple tactical game for one or two players, played on a grid of numbered squares. Each turn, players compete for control of the board by capturing or adding to one square.
subtitle: Simple tactical game
title: KJumpingCube

description: Kolor Lines is a single-player game where the player removes colored balls from the board by arranging them into lines of five or more. However, every time the player moves a ball, three more balls are added to the board.
subtitle: Color lines game
title: Kolor Lines

description: KMines is a game where the player finds hidden mines without setting them off.
subtitle: Minesweeper game
title: KMines

description: KNavalbattle is an implementation of the Battleship game, where two players take turns firing at the opponent's ships by guessing their coordinates.
subtitle: Battleship board game
title: KNavalbattle

description: KNetwalk is a puzzle game where the player arranges sections of wire to connect all the computers on the board.
subtitle: Wire puzzle game
title: KNetwalk

description: Fans of arcade-style games will love the Kobo Deluxe app. This third-person shooter allows you to protect yourself from and destroy enemy ships as they pursue you, shooting and launching themselves at you. All this takes place in an exciting outer-space environment, with fun graphics and invigorating tactical challenges. Move up through the 50 levels and come out a champion.
subtitle: Destroy enemy bases in space
title: Kobo Deluxe

description: Klickety is a puzzle game where the player removes groups of colored marbles to clear the board.
subtitle: SameGame puzzle game
title: KSame

description: KSquares is a game where two players take turns connecting dots on a grid to complete the most squares.
subtitle: Dots and boxes game
title: KSquares

description: KSudoku is a Sudoku game and solver, supporting a range of 2D and 3D Sudoku variants. In addition to playing Sudoku, it can print Sudoku puzzle sheets and find the solution to any Sudoku puzzle.
subtitle: Sudoku puzzle game and solver
title: KSudoku

description: The object of the game is to avoid running into walls, your own tail, and that of your opponent, while at the same time you have to try to get your opponent to run into them.
subtitle: Tron-like snakerace game
title: KSnakeDuel

description: Potato Guy is a drawing toy for small children with several activities. Give the potato a funny face, clothes, and other goodies. Build a small town, complete with school, zoo, and fire department. Create a fantastic moonscape with spaceships and aliens. Potato Guy can speak the name of each the object in several languages, to assist in learning basic vocabulary.
subtitle: Stamp drawing toy
title: Potato Guy

description:
Kubrick is a game based on Rubik's Cube and using OpenGL 3-D graphics libraries.

Kubrick handles cubes, "bricks" and "mats" from 2x2x1 up to 6x6x6. It has several built-in puzzles of graded difficulty, as well as demos of solving moves and pretty patterns. The game has unlimited undo, redo, save and reload capabilities.
subtitle: Game based on Rubik's Cube
title: Kubrick

description: KWordQuiz is a general purpose flashcard program, typically used for vocabulary training. KWordQuiz can open vocabulary data in various formats, including the kvtml format used by KDE programs such as Parley, the WQL format used by WordQuiz for Windows, the xml.gz format used by Pauker, and CSV text.
subtitle: Flashcard learning program
title: KWordQuiz

description: This classic paddle game is tons of fun! The aim is to destroy bricks with your ball by hitting them with your paddle, which allows you to level up. The original Breakout game came out in 1976, and people have loved this simple yet addictive game ever since. Get your brick-breaking fix with great graphics and animation, intuitive controls, and plenty of levels to beat.
subtitle: Classic arcade-style game packed with new features
title: Breakout

description: Whatever you need to keep track of, the spreadsheet app can help you do it. This advanced yet easy-to-use spreadsheet has something for everyone: a simple layout that’s easy to understand, plus the ability to do complex calculations. Spreadsheets are used in many careers throughout the world, so getting the hang of this app can also help you gain valuable skills for the job market.
subtitle: Spreadsheet program with a comprehensive range of advanced functions
title: Spreadsheet

description: Create clean, attractive, and professional presentations with this presentation app. This app features the ability to use text, drawing tools, transitions, 2-D and 3-D art, and even animations to get your point across in a beautiful and compelling way. And best of all, this app is easy to understand and use, with simplified steps for creating exactly what you need.
subtitle: Presentation builder enhanced with templates, art, special effects, and high-impact drawing tools
title: Presentation

description: This app gives you all the features of the best word processing applications and is compatible with Microsoft Office. Create and edit documents easily, create short notes and longer pieces of writing with annotations and diagrams. It’s all possible with this app. Your documents will look professional enough to present to employers, teachers, or other important people. Use this app to compose your next masterpiece or to take great notes; either way, you’ll have simple yet powerful tools available.
subtitle: Full-featured word processing and desktop publishing tool
title: Writer

description: Marble is a generic geographical map widget and framework for KDE applications. The Marble widget shows the earth as a sphere but does not require hardware acceleration. A minimal set of geographical data is included, so it can be used without an internet connection.
subtitle: Globe and map widget
title: Marble

description: M.A.R.S is a two-dimensional space shooter game with excellent 2D-graphics, a stunning amount of particles and shader support. It offers single- and multiplayer gameplay, many impressive weapons and specials and customizable ships. In the year 3547 civilizations across the galaxy have settled their own planets, living in peace and harmony with its environment. But outside the placid habitats, the GREAT WAR is raging. As a famous fighter on your way to never ending honor and prosperity, you have to protect your planet from the imminent doom of your jealous neighbors!
subtitle: Ridiculous space shooter governed by the laws of gravity
title: M.A.R.S.

description: MegaGlest is a free 3D real-time customizable strategy game which takes place in a context which could be compared to that of the pre-renaissance Europe, with the licence that magic forces exist in the environment and can be controlled. The current version is fully playable and supports both single player games against CPU controlled players and multiplayer matches over the Internet or a LAN.
subtitle: 3D multi-player real time strategy game
title: MegaGlest

description: Minetest is a minecraft-inspired game written from scratch and licensed under the LGPL (version 2.1 or later). It supports both survival and creative modes along with multiplayer support, dynamic lighting, and an "infinite" map generator.
subtitle: Multiplayer infinite-world block sandbox
title: Minetest

description: Who knew the laws of physics could be so much fun? With this app, you can solve puzzles by drawing objects like pulleys, levers, and ramps. If your creations turn out right, you’ll accomplish that level’s task and move to the next level. This challenging game will also teach you some basic physics, but you’ll be having so much fun that you’ll hardly know you’re learning.
subtitle: Play games where physics is used to solve puzzles
title: Numpty Physics

description: If arena battles are your idea of a good time, then you’ll love this application. Be warned – this is a game of serious skill, and serious bloodshed. Use different styles of weapons in contests like Capture the Flag, Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Last Man Standing, and Tournament. Each of these modes offers its own form of excitement as you battle your enemies!
subtitle: First-person shooter game based on the Quake III Arena-style deathmatch
title: Open Arena

description:
Palapeli is a jigsaw puzzle game. Unlike other games in that genre, you are not limited to aligning pieces on imaginary grids. The pieces are freely movable.

Palapeli is the Finnish word for jigsaw puzzle.
subtitle: Jigsaw puzzle game
title: Palapeli

description: Penguins are among the cutest animals, so who wouldn’t want to play a fun game protecting these beloved creatures from falling off cliffs and into freezing waters? With lots of levels and adorable characters, this is sure to become your new favorite game. Watch your penguins use the tools you give them in order to avoid an untimely end.
subtitle: Fun multi-level game featuring penguins
title: Pingus

description: You'll need to be quick if you want to win this game! Change the shape of pieces that fall from the top in order to match colors and make them disappear. If you don't make enough color blocks disappear, you'll find that your screen will soon fill up and you'll need to try again. And just when you think you're quick enough, the game will speed up, so be ready for a challenge!
subtitle: A tetris-like game that gets harder as you advance
title: Quadrapassel

description: In addition to listening to your favorite music, this app lets you search through your library, create playlists, play and burn CDs, shows you album art and even songs' lyrics. This app also supports Internet radio streaming and audio visualizations. Enjoy all your favorite songs, stored and sorted in one convenient app.
subtitle: Audio player and radio that plays and helps organize digital music
title: Music

description: Ri-li is a game in which you drive a wooden toy steam locomotive across many levels and collect all the coaches to win.
subtitle: Toy train simulation game
title: Ri-Li

description: Do you love games with jets, naval vessels, and all sorts of weapons? If so, then you will love Scorched3D. This game comes with many different lands for you to visit and engage in battles. You will need to develop a good strategy in order to outsmart your opponents and make sure that you end up victorious. You can play by yourself, with friends, or battle other community members online. Hold onto your hats, because this game is sure to shake things up!
subtitle: Turn-based artillery game
title: Scorched 3D

description: We all love to take pictures in our everyday lives – and we especially love downloading them to our computers so we can edit and share them via social media. This app lets you import photos from a digital camera or phone seamlessly. You can then arrange them into albums, edit them for maximum beauty and effect, and of course, display them on your favorite social networks, like Facebook. This photo app also allows you to create albums that you share on the web, if you’d rather share that way. Whatever you choose, your friends can see all the photos you want them to!
subtitle: Makes it easy to edit, organize, and share photos.
title: Photos

description: Skype makes staying in touch incredibly easy and fun! If you have a webcam and a microphone, you can easily make video calls and voice calls to anyone in the world who also has Skype. This app’s features are simple to use and you can stay in touch with people anywhere in world!
subtitle: Make internet calls for free and cheap online calls to phones and mobiles
title: Skype

description: Slingshot is a two dimensional, turn based simulation-strategy game set in the gravity fields of several planets. It is a highly addictive game, and never the same from round to round due to its randomly generated playing fields. It is a deceptively simple game, the goal is to shoot the other spacecraft through the field of planets, but their gravity makes it tricky. The effects of the gravity mean that although it is easy to learn how to play, and to enjoy playing, it could take a lifetime to thoroughly master.
subtitle: Simple 2D shooting strategy game set in space, with gravity
title: Slingshot

description: This application lets you play a new type of solitaire that will keep you busy for hours! Freecell Solitaire is a little different from the traditional Klondike Solitaire, but the rules are easy to get the hang of. Like Klondike Solitaire, the general idea is to put cards of the same suit down in numerical order, but it’s a little more complicated than that. This card game challenges the mind and provides plenty of entertainment for you to enjoy.
subtitle: Solitare based single player card game
title: Freecell

description: Solitaire is a classic card game that is fun for people of all ages. It’s easy to figure out the rules, but it takes time to master the game.  Luckily, you’ll want to put in the time to really learn how to play, because you’ll be having so much fun. This engrossing and mind-enriching game is sure to entertain you, hour after hour.
subtitle: The classic single player card game
title: Solitaire

description: Discover the night sky with this application. With a catalogue of more than 600,000 stars, constellations from more than a dozen cultures, and many more features, this application lets you see and get to know the stars right from your desktop. This application shows you a night sky that is so realistic, it matches the one you see above you. Set your location coordinates and learn about the stars above you!
subtitle: Planetarium software that shows what you see when you look at the stars
title: Stellarium

description: This game is similar to the original Super Mario Brothers games and allows your avatar to run and jump its way to new levels. The game features 26 levels with different opponents to fight, and fun music, in addition to a story that you can follow along with as you play.
subtitle: Classic jump-and-run arcade sidescroller game
title: Super Tux

description: Tux Kart is a racing game that stars the lovable character, Tux the Penguin. This game features several different tracks of varying difficulty for you to test your driving skills. Whether you’re on Tux’s Tollway or Gown’s Bow, you’re rushing toward the finish, trying to stay ahead of your opponents as you collect Red Herrings (which give you special abilities) and avoid Green Herrings (which trip you up). This game is sure to entertain you and your friends for hours!
subtitle: Racing game with colorful characters and imaginative tracks
title: Tux Kart

description: Teeworlds is a retro-looking game, but don’t let this old-school feel fool you; it’s also an exciting multiplayer shooter. Epic battles of up to 16 players rage, in formats such as Capture the Flag and Team Deathmatch. Try to survive in the deadly arena while dispatching your opponents. One exciting feature of Teeworlds is that the game allows you to design your own maps. Lots of bloody fun awaits you with the Teeworlds app.
subtitle: Exciting multi-player shooting game
title: Teeworlds

description: TORCS, The Open Racing Car Simulator is a car racing simulation game which allows you to drive in races against opponents simulated by the computer. You can also develop your own computer-controlled driver (also called a robot) in C or C++. TORCS is GPL (version 2 or later).
subtitle: 3D racing cars simulator game using OpenGL
title: TORCS

description: Do you love watching movies? Do it the right way with this video application that allows you to watch movies you have downloaded in full-screen mode. Other basics, like volume control and playlists, make your video-watching experience easy and fun. With this application you'll want to invite all of your family and friends to join you in watching all of your favorite movies!
subtitle: Full function video and media player
title: Videos

description: It's bringing old style gameplay from DOS times back to the desktop with up to date graphics! Its gameplay is similar to old classics such as Amco's Kick Off and Sensible Software's Sensible Soccer. The gameplay is designed to be quick, responsive and fun. You are always in control of the player closest to the ball. The ball is controlled via two different kick buttons - one for pass, and one for shoot. Aftertouch can be applied to shots by quickly pressing and holding the direction you want the ball to bend towards. Pushing in the opposite direction to what you kicked the ball makes it raise into the air, pushing in the same direction as the ball makes it dip towards the ground.
subtitle: Great 2D soccer (sometimes called football) game
title: Tux Football

description: Starring kids’ favorite buddy, Tux the Penguin, this fun math game application leads kids through math facts in a way that’s fun and engaging. You want your children’s math skills to improve, and they want to play games – so encouraging them to play brings together the best of both worlds and will help your child learn to love math!
subtitle: Arcade-style game that helps kids practice their math facts
title: Tux Math

description: Create beautiful artwork with this fun and easy to use app! Tux the penguin helps guide children so that they know how to use all of the tools. Recommended ages for using this app are 3 - 12, but anyone who is young at heart is sure to love it! Use stamps, play with shapes, or draw freehand to create something special. If your child loves drawing and creating artwork, then download this app and get them started on their next masterpiece!
subtitle: A fun drawing app for kids
title: Tux Paint

description: TuxPuck is an air hockey game and clone of the Amiga/Atari ST game Shufflepuck Café. The player moves a bat around a table and tries to knock the puck past the opponent's defense. After either party has reached 15 points, the match is over.
subtitle: Air hockey game for single players
title: Tux Puck

description: This fun application is a great way for kids, and even adults, to learn how to type! Learn the basics, or improve your skills by playing games that teach you how to use a keyboard without even looking at it. Children today are growing up surrounded by computers and mobile devices, and learning how to use these technologies well will only grow more important in the future. Start them off with a great foundation by downloading this app and encouraging them to play!
subtitle: Educational typing tutor for kids
title: Tux Typing

description: WarMUX is a free game in the genre of turn-based artillery games like Scorched Earth or Worms. Several players can play together, either locally or over the network. It is also possible to compete against computer-driven teams. The teams are styled after the mascots of various free software projects.
subtitle: Turn-based artillery game on 2D maps
title: Warmux

description: In Warzone 2100 you command the forces of “The Project” in a battle to rebuild the world after mankind has almost been destroyed by nuclear missiles. The game offers campaign, tutorial, multi-player and single-player skirmish modes. An extensive tech tree with over 400 different technologies, combined with the unit design system, allows for a wide variety of possible units and tactics. Warzone 2100 was created by Pumpkin Studios, published by Eidos Interactive and is currently developed by the Warzone 2100 Project.
subtitle: 3D real time strategy game
title: Warzone 2100

description: Battle for control of villages, using variety of units which have advantages and disadvantages in different types of terrains and against different types of attacks. Units gain experience and advance levels, and are carried over from one scenario to the next in a campaign.
subtitle: Fantasy turn-based strategy game
title: Wesnoth

description: X-Moto is a challenging 2D motocross platform game, where physics play an all important role in the gameplay. You need to control your bike to its limit, if you want to have a chance finishing the more difficult of the challenges.
subtitle: 2D motocross platform game
title: X-Moto
